item_desc: An Anti-Front cloak. This one has large red letter "A", crossed out by a white line and circled. This cloak also has a large red brick wall on the back, and in this walls you can notice some blooddrops...You also can see two small intriciptions in the lower part of this cloak and one large over them. The first sats, "Matthew Damir Stone", referring to it's owner. The second one says, "Squeezing our hearts, the memory of the past will live on.". That cloak smells like rock ' n ' roll.
